typography.
thoughtful design.
inspired solutions.

Since 1995, Metadog Design Group (MDG) has developed design strategies that result in the highest quality of communication. We create brand identity systems, packaging, promotional materials, annual reports, magazines, signage, books, art installations, and film titles.

MDG is located in the historic U Street area of Washington, D.C. If you would like to meet us to talk through a project or find out more, we would love to hear from you.

Britt Engen / Founder + Principal
